meanings.definition: Having a large and strong build or physique.
meanings.sent1: The huskiest man in the gym lifted the heaviest weights.
meanings.sent2: She chose the huskiest pumpkin from the patch to carve for Halloween.
meanings.sent3: The huskiest cat in the neighborhood always wins in fights with other cats.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the huskiest of all, booming across the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The huskiest tree in the forest stood tall and proud, its trunk thick and sturdy.

meanings.definition: The most husky or robust in a group.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the singers, she was the huskiest and had the most powerful voice.
meanings.sent2: The huskiest of the puppies was always the first to finish eating.
meanings.sent3: The huskiest of the team members was surprisingly the fastest runner.
meanings.sent4: Among the group of friends, he was the huskiest and could lift the heaviest weights.
meanings.sent5: The huskiest of the clouds in the sky looked like giant cotton balls floating above.

meanings.definition: The huskiest dog in the litter.
meanings.sent1: The huskiest of the puppies had a playful and energetic personality.
meanings.sent2: The huskiest dog in the litter had a thick fur coat to keep warm in winter.
meanings.sent3: The huskiest pup loved to play in the mud and get dirty every day.
meanings.sent4: The huskiest dog in the litter was always the leader during playtime.
meanings.sent5: The huskiest puppy in the litter had the brightest eyes and wagged its tail the fastest.
